title: Processes - Integration by Completing the Square

content.question: <math alttext="the indefinite integral of, the fraction with numerator 2, and denominator the square root of negative x squared, minus 2 x, end root, end fraction, d x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mo stretchy="true">∫</mo><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mfrac><mtext> </mtext><mtext> </mtext><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mrow></mstyle><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="4 times, the square root of negative x squared, minus 2 x, end root, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><msqrt><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msqrt><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 times the inverse tangent of, open parenthesis, x plus 1, close parenthesis, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 times the inverse sine of, open parenthesis, x plus 1, close parenthesis, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>sin</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 times the inverse sine of, open parenthesis, x minus 1, close parenthesis, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="2 times the inverse sine of, open parenthesis, x plus 1, close parenthesis, plus C" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi>sin</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>+</mo><mi>C</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 6.10: Integrating Functions Using Long Division and Completing the Square

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
